skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, or applications. Generates creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics.
skill.summary: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill wh...
skill.author: davila7

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill containing only design guidelines and implementation instructions. No executable code, scripts, network calls, file system access, or command execution capabilities. The static scanner flagged SHA-256 hash strings in metadata and legitimate URLs as security issues - all findings are false positives. This skill provides behavioral guidance only.

content.value_statement: Generic AI-generated frontend code often lacks creative vision and memorable aesthetics. This skill guides Claude to create production-grade, visually striking interfaces with bold design choices, unique typography, and cohesive aesthetic direction.
actual_capabilities: Create production-grade frontend components and pages
Implement bold aesthetic directions with cohesive visual themes
Design with unique typography, color schemes, and motion effects
Build responsive layouts with creative spatial composition
Avoid generic AI aesthetics with intentional design choices
Add micro-interactions, animations, and visual polish
limitations: Does not generate backend code or server-side functionality
Does not integrate with design tools like Figma or Sketch
Does not perform accessibility audits or testing
Does not handle data fetching or state management patterns

use_cases.title: Build creative web components
use_cases.description: Create distinctive React, Vue, or vanilla JS components with unique aesthetics and polished animations.

use_cases.title: Prototype visual concepts
use_cases.description: Rapidly prototype visually striking interface concepts that avoid generic design patterns.

use_cases.title: Design landing pages
use_cases.description: Build memorable landing pages with creative layouts, typography, and motion effects.

prompt_templates.title: Basic component
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the frontend-design skill to create a pricing card for a SaaS product with a luxury aesthetic. Include unique typography and a cohesive gold-accented color scheme with subtle hover animations.

prompt_templates.title: Complete page
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the frontend-design skill to build a landing page for a mobile app. Commit to a bold brutalist aesthetic with oversized typography and dramatic spacing.

prompt_templates.title: Dashboard
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the frontend-design skill to create an analytics dashboard with refined minimalism. Focus on precision, subtle details, and clear information hierarchy.

prompt_templates.title: Interactive
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the frontend-design skill to design a registration form with a playful toy-like aesthetic. Include unexpected micro-interactions and a distinctive color palette.

output_examples.input: Create a pricing card component with a luxury aesthetic
output: Generates a refined design with sophisticated typography pairing
Uses a cohesive color palette with gold/metallic accents
Includes smooth hover transitions and subtle motion effects
Creates visual hierarchy that guides attention to key information

output_examples.input: Design a landing page for a creative agency
output: Produces a bold, memorable design with distinctive visual identity
Uses unexpected layouts and creative spatial composition
Implements a unique typography system with character
Adds atmospheric backgrounds and visual depth

best_practices: Define a clear aesthetic direction before coding and commit to it fully
Use CSS variables for consistent theming and easy customization
Focus on high-impact visual moments rather than scattered micro-interactions
anti_patterns: Using generic fonts like Arial or Inter without intentional design reasoning
Applying predictable purple gradients without creative commitment
Creating layouts that follow predictable patterns without visual interest

faq.question: What frameworks does this skill support?
faq.answer: The skill works with React, Vue, vanilla HTML/CSS/JS, and other frontend frameworks.

faq.question: Can this skill create accessible interfaces?
faq.answer: The skill includes accessibility considerations but does not perform automated testing.

faq.question: How does this differ from standard code generation?
faq.answer: This skill avoids generic AI aesthetics by committing to bold, distinctive design directions.

faq.question: Does this skill handle responsive design?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill includes responsive design considerations with thoughtful breakpoints.

faq.question: Can I request dark mode designs?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill supports both light and dark themes based on your aesthetic preference.

faq.question: What makes designs distinctive?
faq.answer: Each design uses intentional typography, bold color choices, and creative spatial composition.
